name: sbcg
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w0))
-| wnf(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w0))
-| wnf(s0, w0)

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w0))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: Substitution for a variable not occurring in a wff does not affect it. Distinct variable form of ~ sbcgf . (Contributed by Alan Sare, 10-Nov-2012.)
